text: Ara lokajanake satarka kara se'idina sanbandhe yakhana tadera upare sasti ghaniye asabe, yara an'yaya karechila tara takhana balabe, ''amadera prabhu! Amadera abakasa da'o alpa kichukala paryanta yena amara tomara dake sara dite pari ebam rasulaganake anusarana karate pari.â€™â€™''Ki! Tomara ki itipurbe sapatha karate thaka ni ye tomadera jan'ya kono paranta abastha ne'i
